featured.text: But __16__ that Christmas is just a few weeks away, __17__ is a gift idea.
On Christmas Eve, 1992, Anthony had a heart transplant from a 21-year-old donor.
Glenn began the day with decorating the Rockefeller Center Christmas tree.

definition.zh_def: 聖誕節，一個慶祝耶穌基督誕生的節日，通常在每年的12月25日慶祝。
definition.en_def: Christmas, a holiday celebrating the birth of Jesus Christ, typically observed on December 25th.
definition.example: We decorate the tree and exchange gifts every Christmas.
